Title: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE, PARAGRAPH (MM), OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-THREE HUNDRED AND FORTY-ONE, AND TO EXTEND THE REVERSION OF UNEXPENDED BALANCE OF FUND APPROPRIATED THEREIN UP TO DECEMBER THIRTY-FIRST, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-ONE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3719, November 21, 1930 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE, PARAGRAPH (MM), OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-THREE HUNDRED AND FORTY-ONE, AND TO EXTEND THE REVERSION OF UNEXPENDED BALANCE OF FUND APPROPRIATED THEREIN UP TO DECEMBER THIRTY-FIRST, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-ONE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Section one, paragraph (mm), of Act Numbered Thirty-three hundred and forty-one is hereby amended to read as follows:
"1. SPECIAL PROJECTS


(mm) For the construction and completion of the Manila post-office building, equipment, dock and grounds, P2,500,000: Provided, That only the sum of P500,000 shall be available for disbursement during the year 1927: And provided, further, That the funds appropriated for the project may only be expended with the approval of the Governor-General after the Secretary of Finance has certified that funds are available for the same
P500,000.00"


Section 2. The unexpended balance of appropriation under paragraph (mm), section one of Act Numbered Thirty-three hundred and forty-one as above amended, is hereby made available for expenditure up to December thirty-first, nineteen hundred and thirty-one, any provision of existing law to the contrary notwithstanding.1a—àphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 21, 1930.
